camera-not-in-solar-system.title: Camera is not in the Solar System.
camera-not-in-solar-system.description: You need to be in the Solar System to use the SkyBrowser.

telescope-view.no-skybrowser: There are no SkyBrowsers. Create on in the SkyBrowser panel.
telescope-view.error: ERROR: cannot display AAS WorldWide Telescope research app!

error.unable-to-load-wwt: Couldn't load AAS WorldWide Telescope images!
error.unable-to-load-images: Could not load image collection from OpenSpace. Error: {{error}}

image-list.no-images-in-view: No images in view. Try moving the sky target!

added-image-list.no-images: No images added to this browser

display-copies.tooltip: Settings for Display Copies, which are a way to render the WorldWide Telescope view as a ScreenSpaceRenderable.

number-of-copies.label: Number of Copies
number-of-copies.tooltip: Number of copies to add at once.

position-for-copies.tooltip: his sets the position of the first copy. The additional copies will be evenly spread out on the Azimuth, if isUsingRadiusAzimuthElevation is enabled, otherwise it will spread on the Y axis.
position-for-copies.label: Position for first copy

center-skybrowser.tooltip: Move target to center of view
center-skybrowser.aria-label: Move skybrowser target to center of view
